text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ

translation.en.sahih: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is over all things competent.
translation.id.indonesian: kepunyaan Allah-lah kerajaan langit dan bumi, dan Allah Maha Perkasa atas segala sesuatu.
